Home

Announcements



  Registration for Summer 2023: Registration for Summer Session 2023 is March 8 - May 19. Click here to learn more!
   

  Registration for Fall 2023: The searchable schedule goes live on April 3. Enrollment Appointments are assigned on April 10. Registration for the Fall 2023 semester begins (by appointment) on April 17 and runs through May 26. Click here to learn more!
   









Welcome to Advising Central – Sonoma State University’s one-stop-shop for all your academic advising needs.
Academic advising is a central component of your educational journey. Although life, career, and academic decisions are ultimately yours to make, academic advisors can assist you in the determination and achievement of those goals.
The information provided here is not to replace academic advising. To assist in your path to on-time graduation at Sonoma State University, we highly recommend that you connect with your Faculty Advisor and/or your Professional Academic Advisor early and often. Schedule an appointment with an academic advisor today!
